user.name: David Walsh

text: I was once forced to come into work during a snowstorm despite having everything I needed at home.  I couldn't wait to get out of that job.

user.name: David Walsh
user.description: MooTools & jQuery Consultant, MooTools Core Developer, Javascript Fanatic, CSS Tinkerer, PHP Hacker, and web lover.

text: Since the success of a team is reliant upon the developers and not proximity, there's no excuse for not hiring remote workers.

user.name: David Walsh
user.description: MooTools & jQuery Consultant, MooTools Core Developer, Javascript Fanatic, CSS Tinkerer, PHP Hacker, and web lover.

text: Remote development takes away one key limitation in building a great team:  proximity to an arbitrary building.
